generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Montserrat:400,500,600");*{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;padding:0}html{font-size:10px}body{background-color:#232323;color:#e0e0e0;font-family:Montserrat,sans-serif}#root,h1{display:flex;justify-content:center}h1{width:40%;height:100vh;padding:1.5rem;text-align:center;background-color:#473978;flex-direction:column}h1 span{font-size:1.4rem;display:block}h1 span.title{font-size:5rem}.game{padding:1.5rem;width:60%;height:100vh;display:flex;justify-content:center;flex-direction:column}.score{font-size:1.4rem;font-weight:500}.score,h3{text-align:center;margin-bottom:3rem}h3{font-size:3rem}.answers{width:100%;text-align:center}.answers li{list-style:none;display:block;width:50px;height:50px;background-color:#232323;display:inline-block;border-radius:50px;margin-right:20px;box-shadow:0 1px 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3),0 1px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.1),0 3px 4px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.06);-webkit-transition:all .45s ease;-ms-transition:all .45s ease;-o-transition:all .45s ease;-transition:all .45s ease;transition:all .45s ease;cursor:pointer}.answers li.show{-webkit-transform:scale(46);-ms-transform:scale(46);-o-transform:scale(46);-transform:scale(46);transform:scale(46);-webkit-transition:-webkit-transform .65s ease;-ms-transition:-ms-transform .65s ease;-o-transition:-o-transform .65s ease;-transition:-transform .65s ease;transition:transform .65s ease}.overlay{display:none;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;z-index:9}.overlay .button{display:inline-block;margin:30px 10px 0;box-shadow:0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.1);border:2px solid #fff;border-radius:5px;padding:7px;font-size:13pt;background-color:transparent;cursor:pointer}.overlay .correct,.overlay .wrong{position:relative;top:50%;transform:translateY(-50%);text-shadow:0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.1);margin:0 auto;display:none;text-align:center;font-size:300%;color:#fff;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:800;line-height:1.2;transition:all .5s cubic-bezier(.16,.935,.31,1.2);transition-timing-function:cubic-bezier(.16,.935,.31,1.2)}
